body_html:
Of course, there is some effort in building an interface! I just think that it is a difference if the core also would be built in Python, then it would take much more time (and maintenance) to have an R interface - porting code and keeping it updated.

Thanks for the links!

Thanks for the links!
body:
Of course, there is some effort in building an interface! I just think that it is a difference if the core also would be built in Python, then it would take much more time (and maintenance) to have an R interface - porting code and keeping it updated.

Thanks for the links!
